languages.text: Помимо того, согласно отчетам корабельных медиков, среди стражей губернатора, как и среди простолюдинов мира Янус, наблюдался широкий спектр генетических отклонений. Воздействие активных источников радиации или биологической ксеноугрозы были сочтены маловероятными, однако оставалась вероятность влияния {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Губительных сил{/g} на тела и души жителей планеты. Ввиду этого, полагаться на них было бы неразумно и опасно.

traits.locale_text: Помимо того, согласно отчетам корабельных медике, среди солдат губернатора, как и среди простолюдинов мира Янус, наблюдался широкий спект генетических отклонений. Воздействие активных источников радиации или биологической ксеноугрозы были сочтены маловероятными, однако оставалась вероятность влияния Губительных сил на тела и души жителей планеты. Ввиду этого, полагаться на них было бы неразумно и опасно.

languages.text: In addition to this, the ship's medics' reports revealed a broad spectrum of genetic abnormalities among the governor's wardens, and among Janus's peasant population. Active sources of radiation or biological xenothreats were deemed unlikely, but the influence of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Ruinous Powers{/g} on the bodies and souls of the planet's inhabitants could not be discounted. Given this information, it would have been unwise and dangerous to place any trust in the locals.
languages.original_text: Помимо того, согласно отчетам корабельных медиков, среди стражей губернатора, как и среди простолюдинов мира Янус, наблюдался широкий спектр генетических отклонений. Воздействие активных источников радиации или биологической ксеноугрозы были сочтены маловероятными, однако оставалась вероятность влияния {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Губительных сил{/g} на тела и души жителей планеты. Ввиду этого, полагаться на них было бы неразумно и опасно.

traits.locale_text: In addition to this, the ship's medics' reports revealed a broad spectrum of genetic abnormalities among the governor's soldiers, and among Janus's peasant population. Active sources of radiation or biological xeno-threats were deemed unlikely, but the influence of the Ruinous Powers on the bodies and souls of the planet's inhabitants could not be discounted. Given this information, it would have been unwise and dangerous to place any trust in the locals.

In addition to this, the ship's medics' reports revealed a broad spectrum of genetic abnormalities among the governor's soldiers, and among Janus's peasant population. Active sources of radiation or biological xeno-threats were deemed unlikely, but the influence of the Ruinous Powers on the bodies and souls of the planet's inhabitants could not be discounted. Given this information, it would have been unwise and dangerous to place any trust in the locals.

In addition to this, the ship's medics' reports revealed a broad spectrum of genetic abnormalities among the governor's soldiers, and among Janus's peasant population. Active sources of radiation or biological xeno-threats were deemed unlikely, but the influence of the Ruinous Powers on the bodies and souls of the planet's inhabitants could not be discounted. Given this information, it would have been unwise and dangerous to place any trust in the locals.

In addition to this, the ship's medics' reports revealed a broad spectrum of genetic abnormalities among the governor's wardens, and among Janus's peasant population. Active sources of radiation or biological xenothreats were deemed unlikely, but the influence of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Ruinous Powers{/g} on the bodies and souls of the planet's inhabitants could not be discounted. Given this information, it would have been unwise and dangerous to place any trust in the locals.

languages.text: さらに船の衛生兵の報告により、総督のワーデンおよびヤヌスの農民の間に広範囲の遺伝子異常が発生していることが明らかになった。この星の住民の心身には放射線の発生も生物学的な異種族への恐怖も無縁のものと考えられていたが、{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}禍つ神々{/g}の影響は無視できなかった。この情報から、住民にわずかでも信頼を置くのは愚かで危険な行為だという教訓を得た。
languages.original_text: In addition to this, the ship's medics' reports revealed a broad spectrum of genetic abnormalities among the governor's wardens, and among Janus's peasant population. Active sources of radiation or biological xenothreats were deemed unlikely, but the influence of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Ruinous Powers{/g} on the bodies and souls of the planet's inhabitants could not be discounted. Given this information, it would have been unwise and dangerous to place any trust in the locals.

traits.locale_text: さらに船の衛生兵の報告により、総督のワーデンおよびヤヌスの農民の間に広範囲の遺伝子異常が発生していることが明らかになった。この星の住民の心身には放射線の発生も生物学的な異種族への恐怖も無縁のものと考えられていたが、{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}禍つ神々{/g}の影響は無視できなかった。この情報から、住民にわずかでも信頼を置くのは愚かで危険な行為だという教訓を得た。

languages.text: 不仅如此，医护人员的报告还显示，总督的警备部队与加努斯的农奴普遍出现了基因异常的情况。无论是辐射，还是异形威胁，都不太可能会对行星居民身体与灵魂产生这样的影响。然而，这样的影响若是源于{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}毁灭之力{/g}，那恐怕就是不容小觑的问题了。鉴于上述情况，对当地人抱有信任的一切举动都既不明智，也很危险。
languages.original_text: In addition to this, the ship's medics' reports revealed a broad spectrum of genetic abnormalities among the governor's wardens, and among Janus's peasant population. Active sources of radiation or biological xenothreats were deemed unlikely, but the influence of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Ruinous Powers{/g} on the bodies and souls of the planet's inhabitants could not be discounted. Given this information, it would have been unwise and dangerous to place any trust in the locals.

traits.locale_text: 不仅如此，医护人员的报告还显示，总督的警备部队与加努斯的农民普遍出现了基因异常的情况。无论是辐射，还是异形威胁，都不太可能会对行星居民身体与灵魂产生这样的影响。然而，这样的影响若是源于{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}毁灭之力{/g}，那恐怕就是不容小觑的问题了。鉴于上述情况，对当地人抱有信任的一切举动都既不明智，也很危险。

languages.text: Asimismo, los informes médicos de la nave revelaron un amplio espectro de anomalías genéticas en el cuerpo de guardia de la gobernadora y entre la población agrícola de Janus. Se descartaron posibles fuentes de radiación o amenazas xenobiológicas, pero el influjo de los {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Poderes Ruinosos{/g} sobre los cuerpos y almas de los habitantes del planeta no pudo desestimarse. Debido a ello, confiar en los lugareños habría supuesto una imprudencia y un riesgo.
languages.original_text: In addition to this, the ship's medics' reports revealed a broad spectrum of genetic abnormalities among the governor's wardens, and among Janus's peasant population. Active sources of radiation or biological xenothreats were deemed unlikely, but the influence of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Ruinous Powers{/g} on the bodies and souls of the planet's inhabitants could not be discounted. Given this information, it would have been unwise and dangerous to place any trust in the locals.

traits.locale_text: Asimismo, los informes médicos de la nave revelaron un amplio espectro de anomalías genéticas en el cuerpo de guardia de la gobernadora y entre la población agrícola de Janus. Se descartaron posibles fuentes de radiación o amenazas xenobiológicas, pero el influjo de los {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Poderes Ruinosos{/g} sobre los cuerpos y almas de los habitantes del planeta no pudo desestimarse. Debido a ello, confiar en los lugareños habría supuesto una imprudencia y un riesgo.

languages.text: Darüber hinaus zeigten die Berichte der Schiffsärzte ein breites Spektrum von genetischen Anomalien unter den Wächtern der Gouverneurin und den Bauern von Janus. Aktive Strahlenquellen oder biologische Xenobedrohungen waren als Ursache unwahrscheinlich, aber der Einfluss der {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Mächte der Zerstörung{/g} auf Körper und Seele der Bewohner des Planeten war nicht von der Hand zu weisen. Angesichts dieser Information wäre es unklug und gefährlich gewesen, den Einheimischen zu vertrauen.
languages.original_text: In addition to this, the ship's medics' reports revealed a broad spectrum of genetic abnormalities among the governor's wardens, and among Janus's peasant population. Active sources of radiation or biological xenothreats were deemed unlikely, but the influence of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Ruinous Powers{/g} on the bodies and souls of the planet's inhabitants could not be discounted. Given this information, it would have been unwise and dangerous to place any trust in the locals.

traits.locale_text: Darüber hinaus zeigten die Berichte der Schiffsärzte ein breites Spektrum von genetischen Anomalien unter den Wächtern der Gouverneurin und den Bauern von Janus. Aktive Strahlenquellen oder biologische Xenobedrohungen waren als Ursache unwahrscheinlich, aber der Einfluss der {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Mächte der Zerstörung{/g} auf Körper und Seele der Bewohner des Planeten war nicht von der Hand zu weisen. Angesichts dieser Information wäre es unklug und gefährlich gewesen, den Einheimischen zu vertrauen.

languages.text: En parallèle, les rapports des médecins du vaisseau faisaient état d'un large spectre d'anomalies génétiques parmi les gardiens de la gouverneure et la population paysanne de Janus. Il semblait peu probable que des sources actives de radiation ou des xéno-menaces biologiques en soient la cause, mais on ne pouvait écarter l'influence des {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Puissances de la Ruine{/g} sur le corps et l'âme des habitants de la planète. Au vu de ces informations, il aurait été malavisé et dangereux de faire confiance aux autochtones.
languages.original_text: In addition to this, the ship's medics' reports revealed a broad spectrum of genetic abnormalities among the governor's wardens, and among Janus's peasant population. Active sources of radiation or biological xenothreats were deemed unlikely, but the influence of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Ruinous Powers{/g} on the bodies and souls of the planet's inhabitants could not be discounted. Given this information, it would have been unwise and dangerous to place any trust in the locals.

traits.locale_text: En parallèle, les rapports des médecins du vaisseau faisaient état d'un large spectre d'anomalies génétiques parmi les gardiens de la gouverneure et la population paysanne de Janus. Il semblait peu probable que des sources actives de radiation ou des xéno-menaces biologiques en soient la cause, mais on ne pouvait écarter l'influence des {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Puissances de la Ruine{/g} sur le corps et l'âme des habitants de la planète. Au vu de ces informations, il aurait été malavisé et dangereux de faire confiance aux autochtones.

languages.text: Ek olarak gemideki sıhhiyecilerin raporlarına göre valinin dizdarlarında ve Janus'un köylülerinde görülen genetik anormallikler, geniş bir spektrumda tezahür ediyordu. Radyasyon veya biyolojik zenotehdit ihtimali düşük olarak not edilse de {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Yıkıcı Güçler'in{/g} gezegen sakinlerinin bedenleri ve ruhları üzerindeki etkisi, görmezden gelinemeyecek bir seviyedeydi. Bu bilgi ışığında yerel halka güvenmek hem mantıksız hem de sakıncalı olurdu.
languages.original_text: In addition to this, the ship's medics' reports revealed a broad spectrum of genetic abnormalities among the governor's wardens, and among Janus's peasant population. Active sources of radiation or biological xenothreats were deemed unlikely, but the influence of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Ruinous Powers{/g} on the bodies and souls of the planet's inhabitants could not be discounted. Given this information, it would have been unwise and dangerous to place any trust in the locals.

traits.locale_text: Ek olarak gemideki sıhhiyecilerin raporlarına göre valinin muhafızlarında ve Janus'un köylülerinde görülen genetik anormallikler, geniş bir spektrumda tezahür ediyordu. Radyasyon veya biyolojik zenotehdit ihtimali düşük olarak not edilse de {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Yıkıcı Güçler{/g}'in gezegen sakinlerinin bedenleri ve ruhları üzerindeki etkisi, görmezden gelinemeyecek bir seviyedeydi. Bu bilgi ışığında yerel halka güvenmek hem mantıksız hem de sakıncalı olurdu.
